string.value: Apparently, #r#p9120005##k paid for the machine to #p2050002##k, only to keep waiting for the machine to come. #nIn any case, I better talk to #r#p9120005##k.
#r#p9120005##k asked me to convince #r#p2050002##k to send the machine to her. \nIn any case, I should meet up with #r#p2050002##k.
I was able to meet #r#p2050002##k. This is it!
Ah, you came just in time. Got some free time with you?
Actually something terrible has happened. #r#p2050002##k has still not sent the machine here.
I already wired 100,000,000 mesos to his bank account... you look like someone that can negotiate. Can you go talk to #r#p2050002##k and take care of this for me?
In exchange, once the machine gets here, I'll let you be the first one to use it.
I know it's just as important to you as it is to me. Please make some time available and talk to me.
Hey hey, why are you raising your voice? Why? What? Since you wired the money, you want the machine now? Fine fine, chill out!
